DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess prevalence thiamin deficiency obese Thai child .
DOC.detailed_description: This study cross-sectional study . The objective study determine prevalence thiamin deficiency obese Thai child assess association dietary factor thiamin deficiency .
DOC.criteria: obese : weight height > median + 3 standard deviation simple obesity pathological obesity chronic diseases e.g . cerebral palsy , metabolic disease , etc . disease red blood cell medication e.g . steroid , multivitamin , thiaminecontaining vitamin , diuretic drug hemodialysis peritoneal dialysis bariatric surgery
